mapper.select: select rdo_id from edw.fact_returns_v4 where return_shipped_ts > '2024-06-10' and return_shipped_ts < '2024-06-13' and is_active = 1 and return_tracking_id is not null and rdo_id is not null

Select CONCAT('''',tracking_id) as tracking_id_long,tracking_id,product_id,po_id,fulfillment_delivery_do_id,pickedup_ts,expected_delivery_ts::Date, fulfillment_carrier_id,shipment_status,ship_date_ts::Date,delivered_ts ,original_promise_delivery_ts::Date ,current_promise_delivery_ts::Date from edw.fact_order_line_items foli where is_active=1 and order_status not in ('initiated', 'accepted') and fulfillment_carrier_id = 'pitneybowes' and line_item_status not in ('cancelled', 'suppressed') and physical_fulfiller_id = 'geodis' and product_type = 'physical' and delivered_ts > #{start} and delivered_ts < #{end};

Select CONCAT('''',tracking_id) as tracking_id_long,tracking_id,product_id,po_id,fulfillment_delivery_do_id,pickedup_ts,expected_delivery_ts::Date, fulfillment_carrier_id,shipment_status,ship_date_ts::Date,delivered_ts ,original_promise_delivery_ts::Date ,current_promise_delivery_ts::Date from edw.fact_order_line_items foli where is_active=1 and order_status not in ('initiated', 'accepted') and fulfillment_carrier_id = 'pitneybowes' and line_item_status not in ('cancelled', 'suppressed') and physical_fulfiller_id = 'geodis' and product_type = 'physical' and ship_date_ts > #{start} and ship_date_ts < #{end};

Select count (distinct tracking_id) from edw.fact_order_line_items foli where is_active=1 and order_status not in ('initiated', 'accepted') and fulfillment_carrier_id = 'pitneybowes' and line_item_status not in ('cancelled', 'suppressed') and physical_fulfiller_id = 'geodis' and product_type = 'physical' and delivered_ts > #{start} and delivered_ts < #{end};

Select count (distinct tracking_id) from edw.fact_order_line_items foli where is_active=1 and order_status not in ('initiated', 'accepted') and fulfillment_carrier_id = 'pitneybowes' and line_item_status not in ('cancelled', 'suppressed') and physical_fulfiller_id = 'geodis' and product_type = 'physical' and ship_date_ts > #{start} and ship_date_ts < #{end};
